name: Boomsplat
description:
Boomsplat is a platform/shooter/fighting game where the bullets that you shoot bounce on the walls, the ceiling, the floor and on you! Try to finish all the 5 levels with 3 stars by completing the tasks in each, and completing the 3 bonus super-hard levels :)

Try also the battle mode. You have to throw your opponent out of the fighting area.

controls:        ( supports gamepad ! )

  • a-d, arrow keys,   left stick, or d-pad for walking;
  • w, space, up arrow,   or south button for jumping
  • left click,   right trigger or east button for shooting
  • right click,   left trigger or west button for sucking
  • escape or start to pause

credits: 

visuals and sfx: me

music: "Main Theme" from Black Knight 2000 (1989)
